name: ESCAPE (Asylum Jam 2013)
description:
Release Date: October 2013

Created in 48 hours for Asylum Jam 2013, ESCAPE is a short puzzle novel about escaping from a mysterious room you've been put in while you were sleeping.

Developed by Andrea Ritsu and Tomasz Chodakowski with music and voice acting from Zachary Furniss. Originally, an updated and extended version of ESCAPE was in development, but has since been put on hold for other projects.
